import React from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, FormGroup, Form, FormInput, Container, Card, FormSelect, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from 'shards-react' import PageTitle from '../components/common/PageTitle' import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const Reports = () => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); return (
Week Reports Latest Reports

Create Week Report

{t('start_date')}

{t('end_date')}
) } export default Reports
